wikipedia_page.main: Dr Nicholas O'Shiel, is the director and chief executive, Omagh Enterprise Company Ltd, Omagh, County Tyrone, Northern Ireland. In 2008, he was awarded the Queen's Award for Enterprise Promotion - the only honorary awardee that year.

response: * Nicholas O'Shiel, director and chief executive, Omagh Enterprise Company Ltd, Omagh, County Tyrone, Northern Ireland.
